external_games.name: Mortadelo y Filemon II: Safari Callejero

name: Mortadelo y Filemón II: Safari Callejero
storyline:
This time our beloved Bacterium, has inoculated a new serum to the chickens of a farm, with God knows what intentions. The result is that one of these chickens has jumped up to the Super office, and has swallowed an invaluable microfilm, which contained the results of the next pool. Not to mention, that the Super, desperate, sent for the two special super agents of the TIA.

Unfortunately these agents are on vacation in Pernambuco, so the Super has had to resort to two mops, this ... to Mortadelo and Filemón.
